name: TotalHipTotalKneeReplacement
title: Total Hip, Total Knee Replacement
description:
This value set identifies total hip and total knee replacement with any substitute (metal, ceramic, autologous, synthetic, nonautologous)

NOTE:  VALUE SET UNDER DEVELOPMENT AS MEASURE TESTING IS ONGOING.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have total hip or total knee replacement procedures),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a total hip or total knee replacement procedure.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent the surgical procedure of a total hip or total knee replacement with any substitute (metal, ceramic, autologous, synthetic, nonautologous)),(Exclusion Criteria: Partial hip or partial knee replacements, revisions, resurfacing procedures.)
